subject: Blacks
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Darrell Wallace Jr., the second black driver to win a national series race, celebrated in victory lane Saturday, unlike his predecessor, Wendell Scott, who was denied the honor in 1963.
snippet: Darrell Wallace Jr., the second black driver to win a national series race, celebrated in victory lane Saturday, unlike his predecessor, Wendell Scott, who was denied the honor in 1963.
